instruction: [INST] Analyze this file to learn MacBook motherboard repair. The 'definitions' section explains key technical terms. The 'threads' section contains real-world repair discussions. Use both sections to understand and learn how to troubleshoot MacBook issues. Posts from username 'larossmann' , 'dukefawks' , and '2informaticos' are posts from trusted experts.[/INST]

definitions.820-2179: What is 820-2179? a LOGIC BOARD PART NUMBER.

threads.title: <LOGIC BOARD PART NUMBER>820-2179</LOGIC BOARD PART NUMBER>-C - no sound
threads.message:
I have a <LOGIC BOARD PART NUMBER>820-2179</LOGIC BOARD PART NUMBER> it all works, except there is no sound, 

I have tried everything else, 

new sound card, new speakers, new everything except the logic board, 

any ideas how I could fix it, or what I should replace on the board, 

thanks in advance!!

threads.title: <LOGIC BOARD PART NUMBER>820-2179</LOGIC BOARD PART NUMBER>-C - no sound
threads.message: Diode mode on all pins of J4260? Connector damaged? Known good flat cable?

threads.title: <LOGIC BOARD PART NUMBER>820-2179</LOGIC BOARD PART NUMBER>-C - no sound
threads.message:
J4260 

PIN 1 - 0.54
PIN 2 - 0.83
PIN 3 - 0.00
PIN 4 - 0.00
PIN 5 - 0.54
PIN 6 [LEFT][COLOR=#353535][FONT=Arial][SIZE=12px]- NO READING[/SIZE][/FONT][/COLOR][/LEFT]
PIN 7 [LEFT][COLOR=#353535][FONT=Arial][SIZE=12px]- 0.61[/SIZE][/FONT][/COLOR][/LEFT]
PIN 8 [LEFT][COLOR=#353535][FONT=Arial][SIZE=12px]- 0.00[/SIZE][/FONT][/COLOR][/LEFT]
PIN 9 [LEFT][COLOR=#353535][FONT=Arial][SIZE=12px]- 0.87[/SIZE][/FONT][/COLOR][/LEFT]
PIN 10 [LEFT][COLOR=#353535][FONT=Arial][SIZE=12px]- NO READING[/SIZE][/FONT][/COLOR][/LEFT]
PIN 11 [LEFT][COLOR=#353535][FONT=Arial][SIZE=12px]- 1.72[/SIZE][/FONT][/COLOR][/LEFT]
PIN 12 [LEFT][COLOR=#353535][FONT=Arial][SIZE=12px]- 0.00[/SIZE][/FONT][/COLOR][/LEFT]
PIN 13 [LEFT][COLOR=#353535][FONT=Arial][SIZE=12px]- 1.72[/SIZE][/FONT][/COLOR][/LEFT]
PIN 14 [LEFT][COLOR=#353535][FONT=Arial][SIZE=12px]- 0.54[/SIZE][/FONT][/COLOR][/LEFT]
PIN 15 [LEFT][COLOR=#353535][FONT=Arial][SIZE=12px]- 1.72[/SIZE][/FONT][/COLOR][/LEFT]
PIN 16 [LEFT][COLOR=#353535][FONT=Arial][SIZE=12px]- 0.00

Good known cable, [/SIZE][/FONT][/COLOR][/LEFT]

threads.title: <LOGIC BOARD PART NUMBER>820-2179</LOGIC BOARD PART NUMBER>-C - no sound
threads.message: Pin 11,13,15 the diode mode reading is wrong. PPBUS should have a lower reading I believe but this is an ancient board so could be wrong. Check if the audio board is actually getting power.
